profile: Welcome to Joyce Heating Service Ltd. We are a family owned and operated heating business established in 1959. We service and repair all makes and models of gas and oil furnaces. As well as install furnaces, hot water heaters, gas tank-less water heaters, Heat pumps and air conditioning, gas fitting and hook up of gas stoves, gas ranges, gas cook tops, gas barbecues/BBQ, gas fire pits, gas outdoor heaters, and some small sheet metal work across most of the Lower Mainland.
service_area: Vancouver, Burnaby, Coquitlam, Delta, Langley, Maple Ridge, New Westminster, Pitt Meadows, Port Coquitlam, Port Moody, Richmond, Surrey, White Rock, North Shore
products: Furnaces, Boilers, water tanks, tankless water heaters, heat pumps, air conditioners, thermostats, filteration systems, filters, oil tanks
services:
All Makes and models: Natural gas furnace and boiler service, repair and installation
Oil furnace and boiler service, repair and installation
Natural gas, Electric and Oil water heater service,  installation
Heat pump and air conditioning installation
gas fitting 
sheet metal work
brands: Lennox, Aire-Flo, American Standard, Goodman, Armstrong, Airco/Olsen, Rinnai, Navien, Rheem, Bradford White, John Wood,Giant, Honeywell, Robertshaw, Whiterogers, Healthy Climate
specialities: Residential  Heating Specialist for over 56 years
